Posts.Content: patjeffmarlise wrote: I'm one year post op left mastectomy for DCIS and found I have pre-cancerous cells in my right breast. I want to have the DIEP procedure but can't find out what my insurance will pay until after the procedure because the physician is our of network. Can anyone tell me how much your breast reconstruction cost and how much was covered by your insurance. I'm afraid to be hit with a big bill after surgery. At this point I'm considering just having the mastectomy. Any suggestions. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Trying to find out what My insurance will pay patjeffmarlise jewelsinalabama
